How Our Holistic Treatment Works

A 3-step medically guided process designed to fix your hair fall from the root.

Homeopathic Treatment

Corrects internal triggers such as stress, hormones, digestion & metabolism.

Nutrition Therapy

Strengthens roots with nutrient support that boosts scalp circulation.

Lifestyle & Stress Healing

Improves sleep, reduces stress levels, balances cortisol & restores hair growth cycle.

Real People. Real Stories.

What’s Causing Your Hair Fall?

Hair fall happens due to multiple internal & external triggers. Our doctor identifies your exact root cause and personalizes your treatment.

Stress & Anxiety

High cortisol disrupts the hair growth cycle and causes sudden shedding.

Hormonal Imbalance

PCOS, thyroid and DHT sensitivity weaken follicles and accelerate thinning.

Nutritional Deficiencies

Low protein, iron, vitamin D & biotin directly weaken hair roots.

Scalp Health Issues

Dandruff, buildup & low circulation reduce oxygen supply to hair roots.

Lifestyle & Sleep

Late nights, dehydration and poor routines harm your scalp environment.

Genetics & Age

Some have natural DHT sensitivity, leading to patterned hair loss.

Frequently Asked Questions

Clear answers to the most common questions about our holistic, doctor-guided treatment programs.

Is homeopathy effective for hair fall?

Yes. It treats internal causes such as stress, hormones and digestion for long-term regrowth.

How long before I see results?

Most patients experience fall control within 3–4 weeks and new growth from 5–10 weeks.

Is this treatment safe for women?

100% safe for PCOS, postpartum, thyroid-related hair fall and hormonal imbalance.

How is Modern Clinic different?

We combine Homeopathy, Nutrition and Stress Healing to correct the root cause naturally.
